list.name: pyopengl2-19 mapping cursor pos into view coordinate system
list.comment: some refactoring before writing ray-traingle intersection

task.summary: Default task

Initialize my 'pyopengl' project rollback
revised GL specification check function from 'pyopengl' and implemented

Implement basic window control
Used multi threading to handle multiple windows. Need to review close functionality to correctly release occupied memory.

Implement basic window control.
Multiple window control, basic packaging.
Used multi threading to handle multiple windows. Need to review releasing of occupied memory.
Adding omitted files.
Construct basic GLFW, GL gate for logging.

build calculation pipeline
Pipeline is built from Components and Relationships. <Pipeline> is the object that holds relationships. Values can be updated sequentially by evaluating hierarchy of components via relationships bounding them.

organize interface logic
Now there is interface descriptor and container holding real value

build single frame triangle draw
Need to revise mechanism of interface and component-ing

redesign Interface
So, Interface Descriptor returns attribute wrapped by InterfaceValue object. When Input is assigned to IFV object, the Input replaces its IFV object with assigned IFV. When output is called, it sees all inputs and check updated_flag. Then recursively checking goes on until there is no single updated Input or no Input as all. When this base condition is met, execute (def) operate to update Output of the Component. As Output't Object is the same of next Components Input, the next component is guaranteed to have updated Inputs as a result of recursive update. In the end of the recursion, the Component that asked to __get__ Output returns value updated. Wrapping Value with InterfaceValue object also make it possible to directly assign values in between Outputs and Inputs.

Implement NodeSupv
Node supervisor manages relationship in between nodes. This makes in-time calculation possible. Interface values of nodes(input, output) are cached value. It will be updated only when its called, by executing only necessary calculation. This means calculations of nodes will occur starting from of which input value have been updated, rightward maintaining calculation sequence hierarchy, till (def) operate of node of interest is executed. Need testing and revision.

Test noding algorithm
Test fix noding. Value update detection, connecting, disconnecting nodes, deleting intf tested. Need more testing, think of other relationship actions.

Implement noding mechanism to component mechanism
Drawing single triangle tested, works fine. Need to think of raw value class inheriting with (class) IntfObj one more time.
Ignore resorce folder

Abstract opengl operations
Refactoring and adding some new data object. Waiting for Interface's multy-input support.

Add functionality 'add siblings'
Input interface can now have siblings. Sibling(able) input is an input that can generate several others. Siblings are group of interface that are placed to serve same purpose. This functionality is for components that has ambiguous number of inputs for what it does to generate output. For example, 'add' component can add multiple inputs at once. But how much input needed is not known before it is in real use. So if the user needs to input some more values to be added, it can add sibling (input) interface to do so.
branch cleaning

Implement Primitive Element Draw
Refactored vao binding to except multiple buffers. Implemented Primitive Element Draw and while doing so updated component-interface mechanism.
Minor fix
Add interface type checking
add functionality of Compound Component
minor update for Compound Component

write backbone of 'RenderTarget' mechanism and 'View'
RenderTarget(Layer, View, Camera) is a description on where and how to render renderable. View is an inheritable description on rectangular area. It builds graph by having a parent and children. This is to allow referencing parent to define its property(pos_x, pos_y, width, height)

redefine 'View' as a node
To track parent's size and reference, use noding mechanism. 'Component' will be refactored into 'Node'

Provide draw call bonding
Wrote ParentChildren(PC) pattern and SingletonClass pattern. SingletonClass seems to be redundant for now - maybe it should be refactored as to be NoInstanceClass - however PC pattern makes manipulation of drawcall possible in runtime. User interaction can simply add or removed through methods provided by PC.

add abstraction DrawBit
(class) DrawBit is an abstraction of classes that is a part of parent-child relationship and has (def) draw for chained draw call. Basic mechanism is to call children't draw call after or before instance's own draw call. For example window is a subclass of ParentChild so any subclass of it can be added as child of it, then if a child is subclass of DrawBit, window will execute (def) draw while it runs main render loop. Of course the child also can have DrawBit children thus chaining (def) draw call. This way DrawBit child doesn't have to know its root Window object. It just knows it's parent via ParentChild thus encapsulating itself.
Make current GLFW context hooking global-read
enhance result streaming with failed calculation
duplicate grasshopper's stream filter, gate concept

remove node-group
refactoring to simplify
hard coded primitive shape renderer
implement rkernel
refactor `Window.devices` to implement current device tracker
parse variable names from glsl source
implement element array buffer in Shape
fix name 'EntityFactory'
implement bffr cache compaction, merge algorithm
implement model renderer
fix trivial unresolved
implement polygon
implement camera fit 2D space function
implement `BffrCache` overflow operation

MESSAGE.value:
pyopengl2-39 hard coded primitive shape renderer
implement triangle renderer.

pyopengl2-39 hard coded primitive shape renderer
implement line renderer.

pyopengl2-39 hard coded primitive shape renderer
implement triangle sharp edge renderer Learn writing geometry kernel.

pyopengl2-46 parse variable names from glsl source
implement `SimpleShdrParser` and 'VrtxAttrSkema', `UfrmSkema` Simplified mechanism for reading parameters from shader source. Instead of fullspec including lexer, token, parser, it uses regex pattern to figure out layout location values. This mechanism forces all shader's parameter have layout declaration. 'VrtxAttrSkema' and 'UfrmSkema' objects hold necessary information for creating buffer cache that can be used to push data into the program. ! notice that buffer cache can't have one to one relationship with program. Program is independent from buffers and so are buffers. resolve #46

pyopengl2-39 hard coded primitive shape renderer
implement fancy line renderer Now line rendering has property of shape sharp, and thickness property. Important feature is that thickness is drawn perpendicular to camera normal, meaning line rectangle is always facing viewport center. This can be checked by running 'render lines with edge.py'. Farther implementation can include capping.

pyopengl2-39 hard coded primitive shape renderer
append render functionality: implement `PointRenderer.render_square`: Point has dia(diameter), clr(color), frm(form) render properties.
refine OpenGL program build, entity enhancement prosedure: seperate `factory`, `PrgrmFactory` into separate module resolve #54
refactor `_PrimitiveRenderer` Done whilst handling problems below;
dump descriptor functionality of `OGLEntityFactory`: Usage becomes confusing. Better seperate it into something like `OGLEntityDispenser`
append `dtype` property and `create_vrtx_bffr` in `_GLSLParamSchema` instead of : Vertex buffer doesn't match one to one with program's vertex attribute schema. One would want to store vertex attribute in many buffers and weave it using VAO. So better provide access to 'dtype'. On the other hand, using one vertex buffer to store all vertex attribute values is a common practice. In this case, one can use `create_vrtxbffr_fac` to be returned with `VrtxAttrFactory`
remove `UfrmPusher` Now program has enough information about its inputs and can handle uniform pushing. But such a 'Pusher' may appear again when uniform buffer is being implemented.

pyopengl2-39 hard coded primitive shape renderer
implement perspective circle point render Smooth circle using vertex and fragment shader only.

pyopengl2-53 implement element array buffer in Shape
enhance line triangle renderer Now following pattern of `PointRenderer`.
implement triangle point render Perspective point render of shape circumcircle triangle.

pyopengl2-56 fix name 'EntityFactory'
refactor 'Factory' into 'Meta' The class has 'Factory' functionalities but 'Meta' fits better. 'Meta' class is a class that moves dependency of entity from context to application(holder). Inheritor should implement none-context specific functions at Meta instead of Concrete, such as caching. In the same manner 'Meta' provides python builtin context manager pattern.

pyopengl2-58 implement bffr cache compaction, merge algorithm
implement `SkipList` Basic `SkipList` written. Skip list is chosen as a data structure for storing vacant, occupied `BffrCache` Blocks. It is chosen for it having benefits of both array list and linked list, which are, fast binary searching and fast insertion.

pyopengl2-58 implement bffr cache compaction, merge algorithm
benchmark index rendering Tested with different primitives. No meaningful difference except rendering without indexing. Consecutive indexing not necessary. So... `SkipList` not necessary. Merging is redundant too. Simple heapq would do the job for now, even if cache miss is still in concern.

pyopengl2-70 implement model renderer
implement point model renderer Now `PointRenderer` is an instantiate class. Renderer pattern has programs, vertex buffers as class members and ibo, vao, uniform buffer as instance members. Class vbo has all info of its(point shape) kind and instance members stores shape index that is a part of the model. This way rendering can be separated whilst maintaining single vertex buffer. More inspection needed to determine which is better; having independent vbo-ibo pair per model, or, having single vbo for shape type and ibo per model, but latter is good for now.
bugfix expression 'highest_idx' of `BffrCache`: 'highest_idx' to 'active_size'. 'high~' is inadequate expressing 0 length.

pyopengl2-70 implement model renderer
implement line, triangle model renderer
fix trivial unresolved

pyopengl2-73 implement polygon
implement bad bad Red Black Tree It works? tested, but maybe wont in the future. no confidence. But need to move on.

pyopengl2-73 implement polygon
prepare `Pgon` type implement trapezoidation first stage: RedBlackTree used.
implement lazyFunc: Thought needed but not used yet
figure out what coordinate system to use for storing polygon(complex) data ? Polygon can be normalized into 2D vertex array. Lets say it has its own Local Coordinate System. On the other hand, it can be in 3D space, so it can be expressed in World Coordinate System too. One has to be standard data expression and another cached. So which one should be standard? ! In both ways calculation is needed whenever standard expression changes. So it's correct to assume there is no calculation lose dependant to the how standard is expressed. Cant find decisive reason to chose either. Going to cache normalized as existing primitives are already described to store WCS as standard.

pyopengl2-73 implement polygon
fix RedBlackTree: Now accept 'comparator' instead of 'key provider'. Comparator is a function that return one of -1, 0, +1 that indicated search direction of the tree. Complicated comparison can be handled this way.

pyopengl2-73 implement polygon
implement line pnt side test: In the name of `Lin().pnts_share_side`

pyopengl2-73 implement polygon
first trapezoidation done Proceed to cleanup and testing with various cases

pyopengl2-73 implement polygon
implement `PolygonRenderer` With edge rendering
? how to indicate 'render edge'. There are different methods. Some of them are: 1. set edge color alpha 0 2. set edge thickness 0 3. release edge index ! rendering edge is cosmetic for now. Leave it for implicit method 1 or 2 for now.

pyopengl2-75 implement camera fit 2D space function
implement `Camera.focus_pane` Function to tightly wrap 2D pane space at given focus resolve #75
refactor `Camera` Objectified further. resolve #31
cleanup wkernel node module Related to #41, Camera nodes removed.
bugfix `Pnt` circle render Viewport position data needed to correctly measure distance between gl_FragCoord and point position in NDC.

pyopengl2-74 implement `BffrCache` overflow operation
implement `BffrCache.__expand_array` Turned out to be very simple as Blocks were refering cache not array in it. Shrink is another story but that implementation is not urgent.

pyopengl2-73 implement polygon
generalize Polygon Trapezoidation Not yet fully understanding core, implementation fragile. But good for now.
implement Polygon normal calculator Pgon.__calc_normal()
bugfix `Pln.from_lin_pnt`
bugfix Polygon normalized normalized is now stored as np.ndarray not Pgon
bugfix coordinate value equation Comparison without np.isclose caused serious problem. This problem needs better handling.

pyopengl2-73 implement polygon
backup before generalizing HMIN HMAX

pyopengl2-73 implement polygon
test alphabet Polygon
